DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter study randomize , double-blind , parallel-group phase evaluate safety efficacy RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) combination methotrexate versus RoActemra/Actemra monotherapy patient mild moderate rheumatoid arthritis , inadequate response methotrexate . Patients receive RoActemra/Actemra 8 mg/kg intravenously every 4 week plus oral methotrexate 15-25 mg weekly 12 week . Patients good/moderate EULAR response randomize receive either RoActemra/Actemra plus methotrexate RoActemra/Actemra plus placebo follow 12 week . Anticipated time study treatment 6 month .
